title: Understanding Blood Pressure
description: A comprehensive guide to understanding and managing blood pressure, provided by the American Heart Association.

title: Healthy Eating for Seniors
description: Nutrition.gov offers dietary guidelines and resources specifically tailored for older adults.

title: Physical Activity Guidelines for Older Adults
description: The World Health Organization provides recommendations for physical activity in older adults.

title: Managing Chronic Conditions
description: The National Institute on Aging offers advice on managing chronic conditions common in older adults.

title: Mental Health and Aging
description: Learn about mental health challenges and resources for older adults from Mental Health America.

title: Falls Prevention in Older Adults
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) provides strategies to prevent falls among older adults.
